text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-SubstitutionCondition where concept is-a _Conditional

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-SubstitutionCondition
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    _ConditionalConditionalSome conditions may be attached to an allowable substitution. An allowable substitution is based on a match to any other attributes that may be specified.

name: Conditional
title: Conditional
description: Some conditions may be attached to an allowable substitution. An allowable substitution is based on a match to any other attributes that may be specified.
